White-Faced Varre.description: Exhaust Varre's dialogue at The First Step Site of Grace.
Exhaust everyone's dialogue at the Roundtable Hold.
Exhaust Varre's dialogue at The First Step Site of Grace, again.
Exhaust Enia's dialogue at the Roundtable Hold.
Exhaust Varre's dialogue at Rose Church.
Use Festering Bloody Finger to perform 3 invasions (success/failure has no impact).
Soak the Lord of Blood’s Favor in the blood of a maiden, Church of Inhibition.
Give Varre the Bloodied Lord of Blood’s Favor.
He'll give you a reusable Bloody Finger, and the Pureblood Knight's Medal.
He'll invade 3 times in the blood swamp, kill him to get his armour set
Use the red sign near the Mausoleum Dynasty Midpoint Site of Grace to duel him.
Reload, speak to Varre again to receive Bouquet

Boc the Seamster.description: Free Boc from his tree form in Limgrave. Can be found south of the Agheel Lake North grace.
Talk to Boc at the Coastal Cave. Defeat the boss of the cave and return to him.
Boc will move to the Lake-Facing Cliffs Site of Grace, at Liurnia of the Lakes. Reload
Boc will move to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace. You can give him a Golden Needle.
Boc will move to the Altus Highway Junction site of grace
Boc will move to the East Capital Rampart site of grace.
Boc will voice his desire to be rebirthed by Rennala. Two choices to proceed:
01 Give him a Larval Tear. Reload, Boc will appear next to Rennala. Reload again, will make him die.
02 Use You're Beautiful Prattling Pate in front of him, then discuss it (unknown if quest continues after this).

Roderika.description: Exhaust her dialogue at Stormhill Shack in Limgrave
Obtain Chrysalids' Memento from Stormveil Castle
Talk to her and Smithing Master Hewg several times in Roundtable Hold.
Return to where you found the Chrysalids' Memento to find the Crimson Hood
After a major story event involving the Erdtree, she moves to the fireplace in the round table.

D, Hunter of the Dead.description: Talk to him in Stormhill, past the Saintsbridge. He will talk about the enemies in Summonwater Village Ruins.
Defeat the enemies and go back to D to continue the quest.
He will then give the location for the Sending gate in the to the Bestial Sanctum and meet Gurranq.
Obtain the map to Bestial Sanctum
He will appear in the Roundtable Hold, sitting in a chair. He will sell some spells to you.
Give him the Weathered Dagger you get from Fia's questline. Reload area. D's questline ends here.
You can find his twin brother just before the arena for the Valiant Gargoyle boss in Nokron.
You will receive the Inner Order gesture upon interacting with him.
D's armour can optionally be given to his brother. If you do, he will appear again near the end of Fia's quest line.
If you don't, he will remain on the balcony where first encountered.

Gurranq, Beast Clergyman.description: Talk to him at Bestial Sanctum after doing D, Hunter of the Dead's Quest.
He can be fed Deathroot, up to a maximum of nine (9) times, in exchange for Bestial-related items.
Collect Deathroot 05 East Liurnia of the Lakes
Collect Deathroot 06 Castle Sol Main Gate
Collect Deathroot 08 Hidden Path to the Haligtree
Gurranq, Beast Clergyman.location: Miquella's Haligtree & Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree

Thops.description: Talk to Thops at Church of Irith. This NPC moves and becomes unavailable if given Academy Glintstone Key
Collect Glintstone Key near Glintstone Dragon Smarag
Reload, a Teardrop Scarab can be found in the church. Thops will then move to Raya Lucaria Academy.
Doing his quest will reward you with the Erudition Gesture - vital for completing several tower puzzles.

Lightseeker Hyetta.description: Talk to her at Lake-Facing Cliffs Site of Grace
Giver her Shabriri Grapes. Rewards you with the As You Wish Gesture. (3 Grapes)
One can be found near a spirit NPC at Godrick's throne room at Stormveil Castle
Can be found on the lower level of the Purified Ruins. Attack large plank of wood to clear ingress.
One is dropped by Edgar the Revenger, an NPC invader found at the Revenger's Shack in western Liurnia.
Find her in the western side of the Purified Ruins. She asks for another Shabriri Grape
Found a little north of the Gate Town Bridge site of grace. She asks for another Shabriri Grape.
Moves to Bellum Church and ask for a Fingerprint Grape.
Defeat Festering Fingerprint Vyke near the Church of Inhibition for Fingerprint Grape, give it to Hyetta.
Final location is the Frenzied Flame Proscription.
Accepting the three fingers flame she becomes your finger maiden, replacing Melina.

Kenneth Haight.description: Meet him in the northern area of Mistwood and exhaust his dialogue
Return to him for your reward: Erdsteel Dagger
Exhaust his dialogue at Fort Haight.
Defeat Godrick and proceed with Nepheli Loux's questline. Defeat Morgott as well.
Collect The Stormhawk King, at the Chapel of Anticipation upon return. Accessed by The Four Belfries.
Instead of giving her Seluvis's potion, give her the Stormhawk King and exhaust her dialogue.
Travel to Godrick's grace, Reload. Kenneth and Nepheli can then be found inside the throne room.

Ranni the Witch.description: After you gain access to Torrent, head to the Church of Elleh at night to meet Renna/Ranni
Meet Ranni in Ranni's Rise
Have her agree to let you serve her. This may require the Black Knifeprint
Talk to Blaidd, Iji, and Seluvis before returning to talk to Ranni
Find Blaidd in the Siofra River area.
Talk to Selvius to gain Seluvis's Introduction, and take the item to Sellen in Waypoint Ruins
Defeat Starscourge Radahn, this will lead to a falling star crashing into a field south of Mistwood
Drop down into the resulting crater and navigate to Nokron
Reach Night's Sacred Ground and collect the Fingerslayer Blade
Return the Fingerslayer Blade to Ranni and collect the Carian Inverted Statue
Go to the Carian Study Hall, and use the statue to reach the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia
Acquire the Cursemark of Death from the body
At Ainsel River Main collect Miniature Ranni
Rest at the Ainsel River Main grace site and speak with Ranni, she'll task you with defeating the Baleful Shadow
Travel along the Ainsel River until you reach Nokstella.
Defeat Baleful Shadow for Discarded Palace Key
Unlock chest in Raya Lucaria Grand Library next to Rennala for Dark Moon Ring
With the ring, travel back to the Lake of Rot in the Ainsel River area, continuing to the Grand Cloister
Using the coffin in the Grand Cloister, access and defeat Astel
Continue to the Moonlight Altar, past Glintstone Dragon Adula, and enter the Cathedral of Manus Celes
Use the Dark Moon Ring on the Miniature Ranni to revive Ranni for Dark Moon Greatsword
Return to Ranni's Chamber, after achieving the Age of Stars ending, for additional dialogue with Miniature Ranni.

Iron Fist Alexander.description: Alexander can be found in Northern Stormhill. Hit with heavy strike to free
After that he can be found at Gael Tunnel
He can be found at Redmane Castle, preparing to enter the festival, alongside Blaidd.
After killing Starscourge Radahn, Alexander moves to Starscourge Radahn grace.
South of Carian Study Hall, Alexander is stuck in another hole. Use oil pots, then heavy strike to free him.
In Seethewater Terminus, behind the Magma Wyrm, you can find Alexander bathing in the lava.
Alexander can be summoned to battle the Fire Giant at Mountaintops of the Giants.
Alexander is on a large flat span of ruins and challenges player. Drops Shard of Alexander, Warrior Jar Shard

Blaidd.description: Once you enter Mistwood, you will hear a wolf howling.
Return to Merchant Kalé and ask him about it. He will teach you the Finger Snap gesture
Return to Mistwood and use this gesture after hearing the howl to summon Blaidd.
Talk to him when you find him, and he will announce that he is looking for a man named Darriwil
Kill Darriwil, Forlorn Hound Evergaol. After, Blaidd will be summonable, Exhaust his dialog.
Meet Iji and mention Blaidd sent them to unlock Carian Filigreed Crest to purchase.
Renna will request you to meet him at Siofra River. Enter the Siofra River Well and find Blaidd, exhaust his dialog.
Return to where you first met him to find a message. **Where is this?**
Head to the Forlorn Hound Evergaol to free Blaidd.
Go back to War Counselor Iji and talk to him.
After completing Ranni's questline Blaidd is at Ranni's Rise, enraged and hostile.
Kill him for his armour and greatsword.

Fia.description: Talk to Fia after defeating Godrick the Grafted. She only talks only while holding you.
Obtain the Black Knifeprint from the Black Knife Catacombs.
Return to the Roundtable Hold to give it to Sorcerer Rogier.
Talk to Fia, reload the area and talk to Rogier again.
Reach Altus Plateau and activate the Grand lift of Dectus. Talk to her to get dagger **Where?**
Give the dagger to D in Roundtable Hold.
Reload Roundtable Hold and go to newly unlocked area near blacksmith. Exhaust her dialogue.
Head to Deeproot Depths, Prince of Death's Throne Grace and talk to her. Answer No, I want to be held
Give her the Cursemark of Death which you can get from Ranni's Questline.
Exhaust her dialog and reload the area. She allows you to enter a dream and fight Lichdragon Fortissax.
Kill Lichdragon Fortissax and return, loot the Mending Rune of The Death-Prince where she lies.

Sorceress Sellen.description: Find her at Waypoint Ruins in Limgrave. Accept to study under her teaching, exhaust all dialogues.
Reload and Return to Sorceress Sellen. She tasks you to find another Sorcerer and gives you a key.
Go to Sellia Hideaway and open the Warded door in the second pit. Interact with the Sorcerer inside.
After defeating Starscourge Radahn return to her, exhaust dialog. **Return to Who??**
Go to the Redmane Castle throne room and exhaust dialogue with Witch-Hunter Jerren, if you haven't already.
Find Primeval Sorcerer Azur and interact with him, near the Hermit Village.
Meet her at the Witchbane Ruins for Primevil Glintstone.
Reload, talk to Witch-Hunter Jerren. Exhaust his dialogue.
Go to Three Sisters and hit the illusory floor in the centre of the ruins, northeast of Ranni's Rise.
Inside is another illusory wall, to the left of Selvius's message on the floor.
Interact with the Sellen puppet behind the illusory wall and give over the Primevil Glintstone.
Travel to Raya Lucaria Grand Library grace. Outside of the Library you'll find two summon signs.
white sign: Sellen kill Jerren: Jerren's armour drop, Glintstone Kris, Shard Spiral - Sellen's shop, after transform Witch's Glintstone Crown.
red sign: Jerren kill Sellen: Witch's Glintstone Crown. Reload, Talk to Jerren near the summon signs for Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
If you chose to help Sellen, exhaust her dialogue in the Grand Library, reload the area.
Sellen will be in the body of an Arcane Sphere of Faces. Her crown is near the Grand Library Site of Grace.

Gowry.description: Talk to Gowry in Gowry's Shack and he will ask you to find an Unalloyed Gold Needle.
Defeat Commander O'Neil located in the Swamp of Aeonia for Unalloyed Gold Needle.
Return to Gowry in Gowry's Shack, exhaust his dialogue and reload the area.
Take the needle to Millicent at the Church of the Plague, reload. Exhaust her dialogue, reload again.
Return to Gowry's Shack and Millicent will be standing there, exhaust her dialogue.
Reload, Gowry will be back at his shack.
Won't sell insect needles until you confront him about his true form, or kill him after finishing Millicent's quest line for his bell-bearing.

Brother Corhyn.description: Meet at Roundtable Hold. Exhaust his dialogue.
Either: reach Altus Plateu or defeat Mad Tongue Alberich.
He will tell you he is going on a journey to find the Goldmask.
Travel to Altus Highway Junction site of grace, Reload. He is just north of the SOG, exhaust his dialogue.
On the north side of Altus Plateau there is a broken bridge, go here and interact with Goldmask.
Return to Brother Corhyn, exhaust his dialogue. Tell him you found the Goldmask.
Reload, Corhyn will be next to the Goldmask on the bridge, exhaust dialogue.
Defeat Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade).
Reload, Corhyn will move to the colosseum at Leyndell, exhaust his dialogue.
Get the incantation Law of Regression (requires 33 INT, boostable).
Head west from Erdtree sanctuary grace until you see a white message saying Regression facing a statue.
Cast Law of Regression on the message while facing the statue. New message appears.
Read it and return to Brother Coryhn.
Brother Coryhn and Goldmask will move to the bridge south of Stargazers Ruins. Exhaust his dialogue.
Kill Fire Giant and Beast Clergyman in Crumbling Farum Azula, Coryhn will move to Capital of Ash grace.
Travel south, below the elevator, there's a new path that leads to a dead Goldmask.
Collect Mending Rune of Perfect Order. Reload, Loot a second time for attire.
Brother Corhyn may have additional dialogue after the Perfect Order ending.

Nepheli Loux.description: Find her in the courtyard near Godricks grace. Exhaust her dialogue she will offer to help fight Godrick.
Kill Godrick, she will move to the library in Roundtable Hold. Exhaust her dialogue for an Arsenal Charm.
Collect The Stormhawk King, at the Chapel of Anticipation upon return. Accessed by The Four Belfries.
Give her the Stormhawk King remains.
Follow Kenneth Haight's questline. He can be found at the top of Fort Haight. Exhaust dialogue.
Travel to Godrick's grace and rest at it. Nepheli and Kenneth can be found in the throne room. Exhaust dialogue.

Seluvis.description: Speak to Preceptor Seluvis and receive his quest. Must be done after talking to Nepheli Loux.
Find Nepheli at Village of the Albinaurics, exhaust her dialogue and kill Omenkiller nearby.
Go to Roundtable Hold and find Nepheli downstairs and exhaust her dialogue.
Go to Gideon Ofnir and ask him about Nepheli, and tell him about the potion.
Give potion to Ofnir, Nepheli or Dung Eater to and complete the quest at Seluvis for his reward.
NOTE: Giving the potion to Nepheli or Dung Eater will end their respective questlines.

Bloody Finger Hunter Yura.description: Meet Bloody Finger Hunter Yura, near the lake of Limgrave, under an overpass.
Once you defeat the Flying Dragon Agheel, talk to him again.
Approach Murkwater Cave to get invaded, Defeat the invader with Yura's help, Yura must stay alive.
Yura can be found further north of Murkwater Cave.
Yura's Red Summon Sign on a bridge, north of the Main gate Grace in Raya Lucaria. Interact with the Red Sign.
After the fight he will be standing near the Summon Sign, exhaust his dialogue.
Find him at Second Church of Marika. Talk to him for the Nagakiba and a battle with Eleonora.
Winning will reward Purifying Crystal Tear, Eleonora's Poleblade and one other undefined item.
After this you can fight him at Zamor Ruins Grace to get his armour set.

Knight Bernahl.description: Knight Bernahl is at Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill. Pledge to Volcano Manor, Bernahl will move there.
Join the Volcano Manor and complete two assassination quests for them.
Speak to Bernahl to receive the Letter to Bernahl.
Go to Leyndell and find the red invasion sign. Fight alongside Bernahl for Raging Wolf Set.
Report back to him at Volcano Manor for Gelmir's Fury Sorcery. (Must do above before Rykard).
Defeat Rykard then exhaust Bernahl's dialogue.
Go to Crumbling Farum Azula to find him as invader.

Patches.description: Find and fight Patches at Murkwater Cave. When he surrenders, forgive him. Exhaust Dialogue.
(OPTIONAL): Agro Patches but don't kill, let him take your health down, he will give Extreme Repentance. Use this to return him to neutral.
Exhaust Dialogue. Reset, then Patches' shop will be open.
After finishing all dialogue, opening some other chest nearby and transport you to Mistwood.
Travel back to Murkwater Cave and talk to Patches.
You can find Patches a second time on the Scenic Isle, near the Laskyar Ruins Site of grace. (Talk to Rya next)
Join the Volcano Manor and Talking to Tanith. Take on and complete the first assassination mission.
Return to the Manor and speak to everyone there to receive individual requests. Use Drawing Room Key to access more NPCs
Reload and speak to Patches to receive the Letter to Patches.
Go to Ruin-Strewn Precipice and find the red invasion sign. Defeat the target to receive the Bull-Goat Armor Set.
Reload the area and he'll reward you with the Magma Whip Candlestick.
Defeat Rykard then exhaust Patches' dialogue. WARNING Complete all other related quests
Take on another assassination mission, Rileigh The Idle.
Travel back to Tanith, Exhaust Dialogue.
Finish Rya's quest before proceeding
Take on Bernahl's assassination mission.
Take on another assassination mission. WARNING This can interfere with other questlines
Travel back to Tanith, Exhaust Dialogue. She'll offer to send you to Rykard's area.
Defeat Rykard then exhaust Tanith's, Bernahl's and Patches' dialogue. Reset
Travel to the Shaded Castle. Defeat Briar Boss and Exhaust Patches' Dialogue. He will give the Dancer's Castanets.
Travel back to Murkwater Cave, go through fog wall and loot chest. Patches will attack again, he will surrender again.

Rya.description: Meet her at Liurnia of the Lakes. She will talk about having a Necklace stolen
Go to Boilprawn Shack. Speak to BB Boggart, who sells the necklace 1,000 Runes. Killing him is not recommended.
Return the necklace to Rya to obtain a Volcanic Manor invitation.
After reaching Altus Plateau, you can find Rya at Lux Ruins (if you haven't used Dectus Medallion):
Or at the top of the Grand Lift of Dectus. Talk to her and she will teleport you inside Volcano Manor.
NOTE: If she is not in either location, try teleporting to the Grand Lift and riding it to the top again to trigger her.
Complete first part of Tanith's quest, Rya will move to a new room.
Speak to her during her snake form to progress the questline.
NOTE: Proceeding Volcano Manor quests up to Rykard makes this quest impossible to continue.
Return to Rya, exhaust dialogue. Enter the illusory wall in the room right of hers.
Reach the grace in Prison Town Church. Return to Zoraya and tell her what you have seen to continue.
(OPTIONAL) Speak to Lady Tanith and choose the Zoraya's troubles option.
Defeat Godskin Noble in Temple of Eiglay to get the Serpent's Amnion.
Give the Serpent's Amnion to Zoraya and she will disappear from the manor.
(OPTIONAL) Speaking to Lady Tanith will have the new option Zoraya's absence.
She will give a Tonic of Forgetfulness to give to the upset Zoraya.
Zoraya has moved to the Legacy Dungeon's interior.

If you have fully unlocked the area, you can reach it by taking the wooden elevator next to the Temple of Eiglay, getting off at a hidden doorway just below the lift's highest point, and heading straight through the rooms beyond until you jump across a lava floe.
- if the elevator is not yet active, you can reach the lava floe (or unlock the elevator) by jumping off the balcony of the top floor of Temple of Eiglay.
- you can also reach this room by taking the wooden elevator to the top, going straight ahead toward the man-serpent with the lava sword, and jumping out the windows on the left.
She asks you to kill her and end her pain.
01 If you kill her, she will transform back into a snake and drop Daedicar's Woe.
02 If you leave her alive and return after killing Rykard, she realizes that you are not willing to kill her.
02 When you reset the area, she is gone and has left Daedicar's Woe and Zoraya's letter in her place.
03 If you give her the Tonic of Forgetfulness, she simply goes to sleep.

Dung Eater.description: You will find Dung Eater in the Roundtable Hold, after reaching Leyndell, Royal Capital.
Collect 01 Seedbed Curse - East Capital Rampart
Give him one Seedbed Curse. He asks you to kill his body in sewers of Leyndell. He gives you the Sewer-Gaol Key.
Once you find him trapped in cell you can choose to kill him or free him.
If you free him a new message will appear in Roundtable Hold suggesting you meet him at the Outer Moat.
NOTE: If you are progressing Blackguard Big Boggart's quest and have not exhausted his dialogue in the capitol:
- You must go to the outer moat (Here on the Elden Ring Map) and exhaust his dialogue.
- After returning to the area the Dung Eater will have defiled Blackguard's body.
- Speak with him to exhaust his dialogue once again until he dies and you receive his items.
- Only at this point will the Dung Eater Invade the area.
Meet him in proposed location.
Dung Eater will invade you. Defeating him rewards Furcalling Finger Remedy and Sword of Milos.
Dung Eater wants 4 more Seedbed Curses (5 total).
Collect 02 Seedbed Curse - Fortified Manor
Collect 03 Seedbed Curse - Capital Ramparts, Blackguard at the end of his questline
Collect 04 Seedbed Curse - Volcano Manor, From Temple of Eiglay
Collect 05 Seedbed Curse - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree, From the Prayer Room
Dung Eater.location: Miquella's Haligtree & Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree

Dung Eater.description: Collect 06 Seedbed Curse - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree, From the Prayer Room
Dung Eater.location: Miquella's Haligtree & Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree

Dung Eater.description: In Roundtable Hold, give Seedbed Curses.
You will receive the Mending Rune of the Fell Curse, for alternate ending the game, and armour set.

Millicent.description: Speak with Gowry in his shack and he tasks you to get Unalloyed Gold Needle dropped by Commander O'Neil.
Defeat Commander O'Neil
Return to Gowry with the needle. He will give you Sellia's Secret.
Reset and return, he'll give you the repaired needle.
Light the beacons in Sellia according to Sellia's Secret. Each beacon also opens a barrier with loot.
Bring the needle to Millicent at the Church of the Plague
After Millicent uses the needle, reset. Then exhaust her dialog. She will gift you the Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom.
Rest again to move her to Gowry's shack. Return to Gowry's shack. Millicent is there. Exhaust her dialog.
**Quit** and reload at the shack, this will move Millicent and have Gowry return.
Collect Valkyrie's Prosthesis. It can be found in the Shaded Castle.
Millicent moves to north of the Erdtree-Gazing Hill Grace. Give her the Valkyrie's Prosthesis.
Defeat Godskin Apostle. Reset, she will be near the Windmill Heights Grace. Exhaust her dialogue.
Millicent will move to Ancient Snow Valley Ruins Grace. **
Defeat the Ulcerated Tree Spirit mini-boss just before the Drainage Channel Grace. Reset
Millicent will move to the Prayer Room Grace.
NOTE: There will be two summon signs near where the mini boss used to be:
01 Use the golden summon sign, and help her fight 4 NPC invaders known as Millicent’s Sisters.
01 After the fight, you'll get the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia.
02 Use the red summon sign to challenge her in her world.
02 After the fight, you'll get Millicent's Prosthesis. [ENDS QUESTLINE]
After invasion, Reset, she will be near summoning sign was, laying by the pool of scarlet rot down below.
Exhaust her dialog, Reset. She'll be dead, and you can loot the Unalloyed Gold Needle.
Kill Malenia, Blade of Miquella.
Millicent.location: Miquella's Haligtree & Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree

Millicent.description: In the room where you fight Malenia, use the Unalloyed Gold Needle on the Scarlet Aeonia Malenia left behind.
Millicent.location: Miquella's Haligtree & Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree

Millicent.description: You'll get Miquella’s Needle. Use in Crumbling Farum Azula to reverse the Lord of Frenzied Flame Ending.

Blackguard Big Boggart.description: Boggart is introduced as the thief from Rya's questline.
Buy the necklace from him for 1,000 Runes.
Note: You must initiate the quest from Rya before reaching Volcano Manor or you're unable to progress.
Buy Boiled Prawns from him. This befriends him and progresses his questline.
He can be summoned for the Magma Wyrm Makar fight.
He later moves to Leyndell in the outer moat nearest the Capital Rampart, selling Boiled Crabs.
At the Leyndell moat, he will warn the player about his time in prison with the Dung Eater. Exhaust dialogue.
Progress Dung Eater's questline till he is at the point where he will be waiting in the outer moat:
And the blackguard is present in Leyndell. Exhaust Big Boggart's dialogue, he says the Dung Eater nearby.
If you are invaded before Boggart moves there, you will be unable to get a Seedbed Curse from his body.
Reset, and you must interact with the now-wounded blackguard to trigger the invasion.
A Seedbed Curse will be found on Big Boggart's body at the end of his questline, along with his drops.

Latenna.description: Latenna can be found at Slumbering Wolf's Shack
Latenna's questline involves the NPC, Albus. Speak to Albus for Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right). Roll into.
Return Medallion to Latenna. Promise to take Latenna to Haligtree. She joins and becomes Spirit Ash summon.
She will also hint at the location of the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left).
Upon reaching Apostate Derelict, summon Latenna at the foot of the giant Albinauric.

Ensha.description: Upon first interaction, players obtain the What Do You Want? Gesture from Ensha of the Royal Remains.
Collect the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right **Or Left**), Ensha will invade in Roundtable Hold.
Defeating Ensha rewards the Royal Remains Set from where he used to stand.

Sorcerer Rogier.description: First met in Stormveil Castle by the altar of the Chapel.
Kill Godrick he moves to Roundtable Hold. NOTE: Rogier will die if you speak with Ranni before finishing his quest!
At Stormveil Castle, examine Rogier's bloodstain near the rotting face, in the area where Root Monster spawns.
Talk to Fia, let her to hold you. Exhaust lines Talk in secret, Did you know? and About the Black Knifeprint.
Obtain the Black Knifeprint from the Black Knife Catacombs.
Return the Knifeprint to Rogier. Reload the area and he will ask you to look for Ranni.
Upon talking to Ranni she tells the player to leave. Return to Rogier who suggests becoming Ranni's vassal.
Ranni allows player to become her vassal. Returning to Rogier results in him falling into a deep slumber.
Soon after Rogier will die, leaving behind his set and a letter. **Location**

Diallos.description: Exhaust Diallos' dialogue at Roundtable hold.
Exhaust Diallos' dialogue northwest of the Academy Gate Town Site of Grace.
Join Volcano Manor, but don't finish its questline since this will cause Diallos to disappear. [ENDS QUESTLINE]
Exhaust Diallos' dialogue in Volcano Manor's drawing room.
Finish Volcano Manor's questline, or defeat Rykard.
After progressing the Jarburg questline he will appear in one of the shacks, tending to Jar Bairn.
Revisiting Jarburg after sometime will have you find the town damaged; Diallos will be there.
Exhaust Diallos' dialogue. Then, exhaust Jar-Bairn's dialogue. Reset
Jar-Bairn will move over Diallos. Interact, then Reset.
Diallos will disappear, leaving Diallos's Mask, Hoslow's Petal Whip, and a Numen's Rune.

Jar Bairn.description: Jar Bairn can be found in Jarburg and will ask you to become Potentate, but deems your hands too rough.
Reload the area and talk to Jar Bairn multiple times, until their dialogue is exhausted.
(OPTIONAL) Progress Diallos's questline in Volcano Manor until he leaves will cause him to move to Jarburg.
- Killing Rykard before completing the questline and then talking to Diallos will also cause him to move.
Reset, talk to Diallos and Jar Bairn in Jarburg:
until Diallos tells you not to pity him and Jar Bairn laments they'd like to have a stronger Potentate.
Reset, Jar Bairn will move to the middle of the road. Speak to them, then speak to Diallos.
Reload the area, and speak to Jar Bairn once more.
Reset, speak to Jar Bairn. Give them Alexander's Innards, from Alexander's questline, Reset.
Collect Companion Jar talisman from Jar Bairn's last spot and Diallos's items from his last spot.
Note: Not to confuse Juno Hoslow who is Diallos's brother.

Tanith.description: Exhaust dialogue when first encountered in Volcano Manor, to get the Drawing-Room Key.
Enter room with Rya, get letter and talk to Tanith again, she will tell you to assassinate Old Knight Istvan.
Invade Istvan at Stormhill and kill him, return to Tanith to get the Magma Shot sorcery.
Reload the area to find another Letter, this time to assassinate Rileigh the Idle in Altus Plateau.
Return to Tanith, she will reward you with the Serpentbone Blade.
Reload the area, talk to her again to be teleported to the entrance of Rykard's boss fight.
After beating Rykard, return to Tanith and speak to her again.
Reload the area, she will now be in Rykard's boss area, feasting on his corpse. You can give her the Dancer's Castanets from Patches.
Killing Tanith rewards you with the Consort's Set.
After killing her, you will be invaded by her bodyguard.
